item.title: Apple's Latest App Store Changes Satisfy EU, No More Fines Coming
item.description: The European Union is set to accept the June updates that Apple made to its App Store to comply with the Digital Markets Act, reports Reuters. As a result, Apple will not face daily fines for non-comp
